_meta.description: Qwen3-TTS Voice Clone - Clone any voice from 3 seconds of reference audio
_meta.use_case: Clone a voice from reference audio with 0.95 similarity (replaces ElevenLabs Instant Voice Cloning)

agent_notes.TEXT: New text to be spoken in cloned voice
agent_notes.REFERENCE_AUDIO: Path to reference voice audio (3-10 seconds ideal, clear speech)
agent_notes.REFERENCE_TEXT: Exact transcript of reference audio (must match precisely for best quality)
quality_tips: Reference text must EXACTLY match spoken words
0.95 voice similarity achieved with good reference
Supports cross-lingual cloning (clone English voice, speak Japanese)

1._comment: Load Qwen3-TTS 1.7B Base model for voice cloning

3._comment: Clone voice and generate new speech

5._comment: For video sync: frames = duration_seconds * fps
